mapper.select: SELECT user.id, user.name, user.password, role.id as roleId, role.name as roleName, permission.id as permissionId, permission.name as permissionName, permission.url as permissionUrl FROM user, user_role, role, role_permission, permission WHERE user.id = #{id} AND user.id = user_role.user_id AND user_role.role_id = role.id AND role.id = role_permission.role_id AND role_permission.permission_id = permission.id
